item.title: Blog update
item.description: Long time since I updated this blog, if you read this, it means I’ve just successfully migrated from jekyllrb to Hugo. The migration wasn’t hard, but it wasn’t super easy either. I had a few bumps, I had to read the documentation apparently, but so far I like it. I also cleaned up a bit, removed some old, obsolete posts. I hope I can write some new, helpful/useful post in the near future.
